explanations.text: Verbs or nouns representing actions, processes, or states that are often formal or technical in nature, and may be related to research, law, business, or other specialized domains.

Words ending in common suffixes like -ed, -ing, -tion, -ance, -ment, -ity, -ism, -or, -er, -al, -ive, -able, -ible, -ous, -ful, -less, -ly, -ness, -ship, -hood, -ism, -ist, -ity, -ance, -ence, -ancy, -ency, -ancy, -ency, -ation, -ition, -ation, -ition, -ation, -ition, -ation, -ition, -ation, -ition, -ation, -ition, -ation, -ition, -ation, -ition, -ation, -ition, -ation, -ition, -ation, -ition, -ation, -ition, -ation, -ition, -ation, -ition, -ation, -ition, -ation, -ition, -ation, -ition, -ation, -ition, -ation, -ition, -ation, -ition, -ation, -ition, -ation, -ition, -ation, -ition, -ation, -ition, -ation, -ition, -ation, -ition, -ation, -ition, -ation, -ition, -ation, -ition, -ation, -ition, -ation, -ition, -ation, -ition, -ation, -ition, -ation, -ition, -ation, -ition, -ation, -ition, -ation, -ition, -ation, -ition, -ation, -ition, -ation, -ition, -ation, -ition, -ation, -ition, -ation, -ition, -ation, -ition, -ation, -ition, -ation, -ition, -ation, -ition, -ation, -ition, -ation, -ition, -ation, -ition, -ation, -ition, -ation, -ition, -ation, -ition, -ation, -ition, -ation, -ition, -ation, -ition, -ation, -ition, -ation, -ition, -ation, -ition, -ation, -ition, -ation, -ition, -ation, -ition, -ation, -ition, -ation, -ition, -ation, -ition, -ation, -ition, -ation, -ition

The activations consistently target the core lexical items—verbs, nouns, adjectives, and sometimes morphological suffixes—that form the semantic nucleus of idiomatic or collocational phrases, while function words are largely ignored.
